definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: So, in effect, the act of degree classification trivialises the student's achievement.
sentences.chinese: 因此，学位分级制度实际上轻视了学生的学习成绩。

sentences.english: For no-frills environmental commitment, one cannot overlook Vermont.
sentences.chinese: 对于无虚饰环保运动，我们不能轻视佛蒙特州。

sentences.english: And even though I despised school, I thank them for the education they helped me acquire.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我轻视教育，但是我感激他们教会我这些本领。

sentences.english: Finally a vanity tool that doesnâ€™t despise you!
sentences.chinese: 终于，一面满足你虚荣心的工具不再轻视你。

sentences.english: Either way the original team will be slighted and dispirited by this ?
sentences.chinese: 无论是原有的团队将轻视和本不振呢？

sentences.english: Orlando is here, and the Magic cannot be disparaged.
sentences.chinese: 魔术队在此，并且他们不容轻视。

sentences.english: Don’t belittle yourself and don’t put up with people who try to belittle you.
sentences.chinese: 不要轻视自己，也不要忍受那些试图轻视你的人。

sentences.english: Don’t belittle yourself and don’t put up with people who try to belittle you.
sentences.chinese: 不要轻视自己，也不要忍受那些试图轻视你的人。

sentences.english: In the distant targets at the same time, don't think slightingly of the nearby.
sentences.chinese: 在瞄准遥远目标的同时，不要轻视近处的东西。
首先是对实用功能的轻视。

sentences.english: Since Voldemort refused to acknowledge Harry as significant, he underestimated Harry's intelligence and strenth. We all know what happened in the end.
sentences.chinese: 由于伏地魔轻视哈利波特，最后的结局大家都知道了。

sentences.english: Stop belittling your efforts and your progress.
sentences.chinese: 别再轻视你的努力和进步。

sentences.english: The loser's scorn for the award is pure sour grape.
sentences.chinese: 失败者对奖品的轻视纯粹是吃不到葡萄说葡萄酸。

sentences.english: Since Voldemort refused to acknowledge Harry as significant, he underestimated Harry’s intelligence and strenth. We all know what happened in the end.
sentences.chinese: 由于伏地魔轻视哈利波特，最后的结局大家都知道了。

sentences.english: Speak not in the ears of fools: because they will despise the instruction of thy speech.
sentences.chinese: 不要与愚人交耳接谈，因他必轻视你的高见。

definition: to belittle/to scorn/to take sth lightly
to look down upon/to hold in contempt
to be afraid of the consequences/restraining fear
